author: VegeTato
description:
- User can select the rain object.
- User can select to rain object from a selected direction.
- User can set condition to check if the rain object collides with another object.
- User can set action to Stop/Start the rain object.
- User can select object2 to rain object from it on a selected direction.
- User can set an action to stop rain object from moving.
- User can set the rain intensity.
- User can set the rain angle.
- User can set the rain animation after the collision.
- User have the option (On/Off) to delete the rain objects when its out of screen.
name: MakeItRain
shortDescription: Makes an object rain from a selected direction.

eventsFunctions.description: Make object rain from a selected direction.
eventsFunctions.name: MakeItRain
eventsFunctions.sentence: Use _PARAM1_ as a raining object at a speed of _PARAM2_ and direction _PARAM3_ (respawning in _PARAM4_, timer: _PARAM5_, layer: _PARAM6_, z-order: _PARAM7_, intensity: _PARAM8_, rain angle: _PARAM9_)

events.comment: Creates 1 rain object at the beginning to start the repeat spawn event
The timer speed for rain spawning
Spawn rain object randomly depending on the screen width and height
Remove the rain when its out of the screen height

parameters.description: Delete the rain objects when its out of the screen ?
parameters.longDescription:
Setting this option to No, might reduce your game performance
(Recommended: Yes)
parameters.name: OutOfRange

eventsFunctions.description: Make object rain from another object.
eventsFunctions.name: MakeItRainFromObject
eventsFunctions.sentence: Use _PARAM1_ as a raining object from _PARAM2_ at speed _PARAM3_ and direction _PARAM4_ (respawning in _PARAM5_, timer: _PARAM6_, layer: _PARAM7_, z-order: _PARAM8_, intensity: _PARAM9_, rain angle: _PARAM10_)

events.comment: Creates 1 rain object at the beginning to start the repeat spawn event
The timer speed for rain spawning
Spawn rain object randomly depending on the screen width and height
Remove the rain when its out of the screen height

parameters.description: Delete the rain objects when its out of the screen ?
parameters.longDescription:
Setting this option to No, might reduce your game performance
(Recommended: Yes)
parameters.name: OutOfRange

events.comment: Start spawning rain objects from another object

eventsFunctions.description: Could be used with interaction condition.
eventsFunctions.name: StopSingleRain

eventsFunctions.description: Change rain animation when it collides with other object.
eventsFunctions.name: RainCollide
eventsFunctions.sentence: If the rain _PARAM1_ collided with _PARAM2_ change the rain animation to _PARAM3_

parameters.longDescription: You can set the animation to 0 if you dont want/have rain animation
parameters.name: RainAnimation

parameters.description: Change the rain position after the collide, to the other object surface ?
parameters.name: surface

parameters.description: Remove the rain object after its animation finished ?
parameters.name: RemoveRain

parameters.description: Remove the rain object if it collides with the edge of the other object ?
parameters.name: edge

parameters.description: Stop rain movment after the collide with the other object ?
parameters.name: stop
